page.title: 03FIRE COLLEGE LIFE AT MORETON
page.content: The{Fire College}is important to Moreton,because it employs many of the population (14% of parents in a class survey).It has a sports complex at the college. This consists of a swimming pool, tennis courts, volleyball courts, badminton courts and two full size football pitches. It is open to the public at weekends.To gain entrance to the sports complex you need a membership pass. We interviewed a fireman's{family.}They like it at the college because there are lots of {activities}to do and you meet lots of different people.Their favourite thing at the college is the sports complex where they swim or play games.The mother does not like the house because it is not designed well.The father is a lecturer and he teaches on hazardous substances.The family has lived there 15 months.
